definition: belt/band/ribbon/strap/girdle/(coll.) audio or video tape/Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri)/comb pen shell (Atrina pectinata)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The gray underwear wadded over a belt says So what.
sentences.chinese: 內衣褲被卷在一根帶子上，卻說那又如何。

sentences.english: Your bra band is too large.
sentences.chinese: 也許你的胸罩帶子太寬了。

sentences.english: I rewound the tape and played her voice back to her.
sentences.chinese: 我把帶子倒回去，把她的聲音放給她聽。

sentences.english: The tape acts as ribbing that we will be sewing around.
sentences.chinese: 這條帶子就像書的肋骨，幫助我們圍繞它進行縫訂。

sentences.english: Use the straps inside the bag to prevent the clothes from moving.
sentences.chinese: 那就藉助包裏的帶子來阻止衣物移動吧。

sentences.english: The corpuscle agent hardly sees the alarm belt cook.
sentences.chinese: 小單間的賣次很多見到鈴鐺帶子熔化。

sentences.english: With the belt of truth buckled around your waist, with the breastplate of righteousness in place.
sentences.chinese: 用真理當作帶子束腰，用公義當作護心鏡遮胸。

sentences.english: the scraped escapee taped the grapes into various shapes.
sentences.chinese: 擦傷的已逃走犯用帶子把蒲萄紮成各種外形。

sentences.english: The Whangpoo was a glistening ribbon of drab yellow; it flowed with a quiet contentment .
sentences.chinese: 黃浦像一條發光的灰黃色帶子，很和平，很快樂。

sentences.english: It is also kind of fun to see what happens when you cut the band.
sentences.chinese: 把莫比而斯帶子剪斷，發生的事情同樣有趣。

sentences.english: "You look fine, " Koppel said when the tape began to roll.
sentences.chinese: “你氣色不錯，”帶子開始轉動時科佩爾說。

sentences.english: The ribbon of the rifle is fabricated with fiber.
sentences.chinese: 來復槍的帶子是用纖維製作的。

sentences.english: The bells are attached by black leather or webbing straps.
sentences.chinese: 肩甲與胸甲用皮革或帶子連接。

sentences.english: The detective belted his pistol on.
sentences.chinese: 偵探用帶子將手槍繫住。

sentences.english: Emboldened, I yanked the strap of her backpack and then pushed her.
sentences.chinese: 我壯了壯膽，猛拽她揹包的帶子，然後往前一推。
一隻麼有帶子的手提包。

definition: (of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
